titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 1645: Mānavadharmaśāstra.

notesStmt.note: Title from colophon (f. 160v-161r); alternate title Manusmṛti from title page (f. 1r).
161 leaves foliated 1-160, [161], upper left and lower right verso.
Mistakes covered over in yellow or blacked out; some corrections and additions in margins; significant numbers or phrases highlighted in red.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Manuscript is a copy of a 1st-century work on Hindu law (dharma), rites, customs, and religious life of that period.

msItem.title: Mānavadharmaśāstra.
मानवधर्मशास्त्र
msItem.colophon: Colophon: iti mānave dharmaśāstrebhṛguprokte dvādaśodhyāyaḥ // 12 // śubham astu sarva jagatām (f. 160v).
